summary: Mentally disturbed Retex of the executioners hood, the execution hood [victim] and the Dark brotherhood execution hood
descriptionHtml:
I guess this is something for the psychopaths and deluded heroes of Skyrim :) 


All textures are 1024x1024 and the execution victim hoods come with their own bump maps

 These items might or might not be craftable in your game depending on the mods you have installed...to get them via console (¬ key) type:
\"player.additem 000cf8b2 1\"  and press enter
then type:
\"player.additem 0005a9df 1\" and press enter 
and finally type:
\"player.additem 0005a9e3 1\" and press enter
exit the console (via the ¬ key once more) and check your inventory
*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete \"executioners_cap.dds\" from ...\\Data\\textures\\clothes\\executioner and the folder \"executionhood\" from ...\\Data\\textures\\clothes

*****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is prohibited without my prior consent.
*****************************************************************************

My other mods:

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5871]Clavicus Vile Themed Nightingale Armor[/url]
author: DW420
